discrepancies_found.description: Alt-Svc headers accepted and may affect routing

bypasses.description: Exploits Header Buffer Overflow at 8192 bytes
bypasses.curl_command:
# Note: Add payload after 8192 byte boundary
curl -H "X-Large-Header: " "https://www.poste.it"
